title: Educational Design for Understanding Computer Viruses Using Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational computer science knowledge, instructional methodology understanding, and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies for preservice teachers to understand the intrinsic characteristics of computer viruses and integrate them into language education contexts

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the technical mechanisms and societal impacts of computer viruses.
Learners can design virtual world scenario-based activities to develop instructional materials that concretize abstract concepts.
Learners can analyze project outcomes using learner-centered assessment rubrics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
